parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The problems with the front suspension and steering can cause the vehicle to vibrate, pull to one side, and lose stability, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Vibrations at high speeds
uneven tire wear
front end slanted inward
bad vibration coming from the front end
loose feeling when driving on rough terrain
noise coming from the front end
jerking of the steering wheel when hitting bumps
drifting to one side.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission issues can cause the vehicle to hesitate or fail to shift gears, leading to loss of control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Automatic transmission has trouble shifting
high RPMs at low speeds
hesitation to shift gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake problems can cause the vehicle to lose stopping power, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brakes feel like they don't want to work when applied quickly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure due to Debris and Contamination
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to suddenly stop or jerk while driving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission jerks or hesitates while shifting
the vehicle suddenly stops or loses power
the transmission leaks fluid
the vehicle has a burning oil smell.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Transmission Failure due to Wear and Tear
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The premature failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to suddenly stop or jerk while driving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission jerks or hesitates while shifting
the vehicle suddenly stops or loses power
the transmission leaks fluid.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Improper transmission repairs can cause the vehicle to experience further problems, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The transmission leaks fluid
the vehicle has a burning oil smell
the transmission repair does not resolve the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to suddenly stop or jerk while driving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle can shift from park into drive without applying the brakes
the transmission jerks or hesitates while shifting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of respect for scheduled appointments and poor communication can lead to frustration and mistrust among customers, potentially affecting their loyalty to the brand and overall satisfaction with the vehicle.
symptoms: Dealership fails to honor scheduled appointments
delays or neglects to perform repairs
poor communication with customers
lack of transparency regarding repair status.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in providing remedies for recalled vehicles can put drivers and passengers at risk of serious injury or even death, as in the case of defective airbags.
symptoms: Long wait times for recall repairs
lack of available parts
no solution provided despite repeated requests
feeling of neglect and concern for safety.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of airbags to deploy in the event of a crash can result in serious injury or death, as seen in the reported incident.
symptoms: Airbags fail to deploy in a crash
resulting in injury or fatality
police report filed
vehicle deemed a total loss.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine compartment fire can cause serious injuries, including second-degree burns, and total loss of the vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly catches fire
often without warning
resulting in significant damage and risk of injury.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure to Replace Recalled Crankshaft Bolt
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to replace the recalled crankshaft bolt can lead to engine failure, stalling, and potentially cause accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle may stall or cut off while driving
and the dealer may be unable to determine the cause of the problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling and cutting off can cause accidents, especially if it occurs at high speeds, and can lead to a loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or cuts off while driving at any speed
and the dealer may be unable to determine the cause of the problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Warped brake rotors can cause vibrations, noise, and uneven braking, leading to reduced vehicle control and increased stopping distances, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Brake rotors warp under normal use
causing vibrations
noise
and uneven braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the brake system can cause loss of vehicle control, increased stopping distances, and accidents, putting the driver and passengers at risk.
symptoms: Squealing and grinding brakes
uneven braking
brake pads wearing out prematurely
brake fluid leaks
and vibrations while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Brake Maintenance and Repair Services
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Inadequate brake maintenance and repair services can lead to recurring brake problems, causing frustration, inconvenience, and safety risks for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Dealership unable to provide necessary parts for repairs
poor customer service
and inadequate maintenance recommendations.
